name: MOAR ZAMBIZ (ZAMBI 2 KIL DLC)
detailed_description:
Have you run outa ZAMBIZ 2 KIL? Don't worry, we've got you covered, buy this DLC and you will instantly get a lot more ZAMBIZ! Double the ZAMBIZ, double the fun, ten times the price. Awesome deal, isn't it?

Here are the awesome features that are included with this DLC:
  • Increased challenge and difficulty
  • Increased number of zombies to fight
about_the_game:
Have you run outa ZAMBIZ 2 KIL? Don't worry, we've got you covered, buy this DLC and you will instantly get a lot more ZAMBIZ! Double the ZAMBIZ, double the fun, ten times the price. Awesome deal, isn't it?

short_description: Have you run outa ZAMBIZ 2 KIL? Don't worry, we've got you covered, buy this DLC and you will instantly get a lot more ZAMBIZ! Increases difficulty and zombie count.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: Single Core, anything that can run windows
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Not needed, onboard will work fine
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything that can play music
